sentences.sContent: ...a type of bacteria that include the microbes responsible for tuberculosis and leprosy.
sentences.sCn: …包括引起结核病和麻风病的微生物在内的一类细菌。

remMethod.val: micro(小) + be(=bio生命) → 小的生命 → 微生物

words.tran: 微生物的；由细菌引起的

trans.tranOther: an extremely small living thing which you can only see if you use a  microscope  . Some microbes can cause diseases.
